item.title: What Is a Distributed Social Network Anyway?
item.description: What is a Distributed Social Network Anyway? Ah, the digital age - where our lives are increasingly woven into the fabric of the internet. But let’s talk about a revolution, a shift away from the corporate giants that have, for too long, held our data, privacy, and freedoms hostage.
